steps.name: Request password reset token via Mailpit for: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com
POST /auth/forgot-password — Request password reset for: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com
Wait for MailPit message (typed) for recipient: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com
Wait for MailPit message for recipient: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com
Wait for MailPit message for recipient: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com (timeout: 20s)
Search MailPit messages for recipient: salvatore.rolfson@yahoo.com
Assert status code is 200
